long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome web extension for verifying Aqua-Chains on Aqua-Protocol v1.2

1. Offline Verification: Upload and verify Aqua-Chains offline.
2. Name-Resolution: Convert wallet addresses to aliases.
3. Realtime Verification: Verify chains in your Personal-Knowledge-Container.

Use: Verify chains offline, resolve names, or check in real-time.
Compatibility: Supports Aqua-Protocol v1.2.
